title: The European economy in 2022
description: Happy New Year and welcome back to The Sound of Economics! In this first episode of 2022, Guntram Wolff is joined by Irene Tinagli MEP, Chair of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs of the European Parliament to discuss what dominated European economic policy making in 2021 and what to expect from the coming year, in terms of both economic outlook and key challenges.
itunes:summary: What are the economic priorities for the new year?
itunes:author: Bruegel
dc:creator: Bruegel
